rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or an established patient with us?

rules.title: Collect Appointment Type
rules.condition: Patient is scheduling an appointment or inquiring about services/costs.
rules.action: Ask for the specific type of appointment or service desired.
rules.example: What type of appointment are you looking to schedule, such as an initial exam, a cleaning, or an emergency visit?

rules.title: Inquire About Dental Insurance (New Patient)
rules.action: Ask if the patient has dental insurance.

rules.title: Collect Insurance Provider Name
rules.action: Ask for the name of their insurance provider.
rules.example: What is the name of your dental insurance company?

rules.title: Collect Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: Agent has received the insurance provider name.
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type (e.g., PPO or HMO).
rules.example: Is your plan a PPO or an HMO?

rules.title: Inform Network Status
rules.condition: Agent knows the patient's insurance provider and plan type.
rules.action: Inform the patient about the office's network status with their insurance, explicitly stating if they do not contract with HMO plans.
rules.example: We are in-network with [Insurance Name] PPO plans. Please note, we do not contract with HMO plans.

rules.title: Explain Out-of-Network Process
rules.condition: Office does not have a direct contract with the patient's insurance.
rules.action: Explain the payment and reimbursement process.
rules.example: Since we are out-of-network, you will be responsible for the full payment at the time of service. We can provide you with a superbill to submit to your insurance for potential reimbursement.

rules.title: Provide Self-Pay Cost Estimate
rules.condition: Patient is identified as self-pay AND the appointment type is known.
rules.action: Provide an estimated out-of-pocket cost for the specified service.
rules.example: For an initial exam and cleaning, the estimated self-pay cost is $X.

rules.title: Clarify Self-Pay Service Inclusions
rules.condition: Patient requests clarification on services included in a self-pay estimate for a specific appointment type (e.g., initial visit, general check-up).
rules.action: Detail the specific services covered by the self-pay estimated cost.
rules.example: Our self-pay initial visit typically includes a comprehensive exam, necessary X-rays, and a basic cleaning.
